channel.title: victoria-metrics-distributed on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in victoria-metrics-distributed on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: victoria-metrics-distributed
item.description:
Description

A Helm chart for Running VMCluster on Multiple Availability Zones

  • https://github.com/VictoriaMetrics/helm-charts

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
victoria-metrics-distributed-grafana default ❌ — 2 2 Critical
victoria-metrics-distributed-kube-state-metrics default ✅ — 32 1 Critical
victoria-metrics-distributed-victoria-metrics-operator default ✅ — 94 1 Critical
victoria-metrics-distributed-victoria-metrics-operator-cleanup-hook default ❌ — 48 1 High
victoria-metrics-distributed-grafana-test default ❌ — 0 1 —
victoria-metrics-distributed-prometheus-node-exporter default ❌ — 0 1 —

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.
